```{r echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
data <- read_csv("data/FinancialJournal.csv")
# Showing the structure of the dataset
data <- data %>% distinct()
# data[data$participantId == 0, ]
data <- group_by(data, participantId, timestamp, category)
data <- summarise(data,
                  avg_sales = mean(amount))
data
```
